name: Zen Garden (itch) (CrowStudios)
description:
Welcome to the Garden

Stay as long as you wish. walk around our grounds and calm yourself and enjoy the beauty.

Walk around the Zen Garden,  recenter yourself and feel free to return when ever you are feeling stressed or angry.

I hope that you enjoy your stay.

this game is a single player atmospheric experience.

download size : 522 MB

unzip size: 970MB

trailer:

All donations will go straight into future projects to order to fund development.
